website_summaries.verdict: Aside from the shoe’s tasteful aesthetics, which both old school fans and new supporters of the brand admire, Puma Icra Trainer SD delivers more than what is expected at its affordable price. If you are on a budget or you just love the shoe’s design, the Icra Trainer SD is a good cop in many ways. This is easily one of the best budget Puma shoes around.
pros: Most reviewers express their liking to the shoe’s classic and simple design
Majority of the wearers appreciate the comfort the shoe offers
A pair of Puma Icra Trainer SD is one of the most affordable shoes in the market today
A couple of the shoe users disclose that it breaks in easily and nicely
Some of Puma’s loyal fans specifically appreciate the old school look of the shoe, in which they add that it had a nostalgic effect on them
The Puma Icra Trainer SD comes in a whole array of colorways for buyers to choose from
A few purchasers notice that they get compliments every time they wear the shoe
With the shoe’s comfort and aesthetics, it is of great value given its price, according to a number of consumers
A handful of commenters state that they recommend the Puma Icra Trainer SD to friends and family
cons: A substantial number of buyers say that the shoe is very tough to clean
There are a few users who observe that the shoe’s color fades quite quickly
This shoe runs narrow, especially in the toe box area, some reviews have mentioned

customer_reviews.title: 'Nostalgic sporty OAP' !
customer_reviews.text: My first PUMA Trainers (at age 70 !!). Ordered half-size above my normal shoe size on the basis of occasionally wearing sports socks and wanted to 'feel a snug, not sloppy fit'. I consider I did the right thing - for me at least. Lovely soft feel to the materials, particularly the leather uppers, reminiscent to a pair of bedroom slippers. All-in-all a well made, practical addition to my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: THE TOAD

customer_reviews.title: A well fitting and good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have long but narrow feet, and Puma always seem to fit me well. I was delighted with these. They look great, and I love the "Burnt Olive" green that I got them in. I've had suede shoes from Nike which faded to different degrees on different parts of the shoe making them look very odd, but the Pumas I've had over the years always fade uniformally and generally clean up well. I'm hoping that these will be no different. Overall I'm very pleased with my purchase. a well fitting and good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Puma trainers and this is now my 5th pair - albeit, my first in grey. Its great to get a true size 13! These, as always, were comfortable from day 1, they look good and they are well made. I use them more as a casual shoe and they are rarely off my feet. They are also easy to clean with a suede brush - and even after a good soaking, come up looking almost like new. I usually get 2-3 years out of Puma trainers and I am hoping for the same from these. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Taking it easy!

customer_reviews.title: Classic design and a bargain to boot (well trainer to be exact).
customer_reviews.text: A great looking classic puma suede trainer. Honestly it's the first pair of Puma trainers I have bought since the early 90s, back to the early MADCHESTER days I fondly remember. Fitting well and looking good, I may have to hunt out the old tie dye tshirt, baggies and fishing hat and search out where the stone roses are giging next.
customer_reviews.author: Jaman21

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers yet
customer_reviews.text: The photo gives the green of these trainers no justice. The colour is beautiful. Puma always do wonderfully comfortable trainers so that was never a problem either. Good price for a good set of trainers. My last were the very same style but red and they lasted just under a year with nearly everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Styling!
customer_reviews.text: Style is great! It will take a little breaking in as Pumas have high arch padding, so some may not like it. What I like most about the shoe is that it fits snugly around the foot like a glove. Quite a bit of lateral movement, so you shouldn't buy this as a running shoe. It is meant as a walking shoe. Suede material, so you will want to spray them with water stop before you take them on the road.
customer_reviews.author: James Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Dye On Socks After Wearing
customer_reviews.text: These are great smart comfortable trainers (run small). I am a 10 but ordered 11 and they fit fine. They are a little stiff but improve over time. So why 3 and not 5 stars, well i have noticed after wearing them, my socks have the ink of the dye on them. So despite being a great pair of trainers, they have a fault and i am now reluctant to wear them. It is so disappointing that quality control is so poor these days.
customer_reviews.author: dsido

customer_reviews.title: Super-Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My hubbie bought these to wear to work; he fits flooring and gets through trainers like you wouldn't believe. However, these ones REALLY impressed him. The spongy sole is super-comfy and they are lovely quality. Far too good to wear to work and I notice he's been wearing them for casualwear instead...and he's a hard person to please when it comes to shoes!!! Definitely recommended; I'd even be tempted to get some myself!
customer_reviews.author: Lambie

customer_reviews.title: great buy great price
customer_reviews.text: the perfect shoe great fast delivery and great price but sadly and I do mean sadly they proved to be too narrow in fit so much so I couldn't even without the laces manage to get my right foot in the shoe I had no option but to return them but my refund was back in my account the second the post office scanned them if they had been a wider fitting shoe I would have bought another pair
customer_reviews.author: happy reader

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking trainers and comfortable once worn in a couple of times as the material is suede and not as pliable as the mesh trainers I am more used to, the fit is true to size which is what I usually find with Puma and I would say they are good for the price. Overall I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Small sizing
customer_reviews.text: I only ever buy UKsize6 but found these small fitting - recommend sizing up. Reasonably wide fit though & comfortable for general wear - not supportive enough though if you want them for long walks / sport. Fairly flat fit . Good quality and lovely dark navy colour true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife who really likes them and finds them a good fit. She really likes the colour. The only word of caution is that she was wearing puma carina trainers and they have a thicker sole which gives a her little more height. Other than that everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Berty614

customer_reviews.title: Wide and big
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these in a size 4 before and they have been a good fit. However, now that they are unisex, the fit is much larger and wider than before. They are not sized for a woman's foot any more. Unfortunately, I did not realise the problem before the return date had gone past. Even with an insole they are still too big and wide. Sizing down to a 3 1/2 was also useless as they were better in length but still too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good value product,comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally wear trainers. But I thought at the price for a named brand shoe,I'll take a gamble.I could always return them if unsuitable..Well I won't be,they fit very well and still comfortable after a few hours of walking.Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Paget

customer_reviews.title: Smart Looking Trainer BUT Can be Dangerously Slippy In Wet Weather
customer_reviews.text: The trainer looks smart but the soles are thin enough to feel "small stones" if stepped on. I don't know what the material the soles are made of but they become very slippy on some surfaces when in wet weather. For me I slipped twice when in rain, and now consider them too dangerous to wear in wet weather. Sorry its a negative report but feel that's it is important for people to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Twenty quid is twenty quid!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, great! But, they aren't the same quality as more expensive Puma trainers! They sure look the part! My advice is to go one size up as they are a little on the tight side, not sure that would help much as they are narrow, rather than too long!
customer_reviews.author: TurboRay

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm, not sure..
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be well made, but I prefer both my Dek and Skechers for comfort. These are certainly not as light, but may be more durable, time will tell. The soles are really tricky to get mud and stones out of!
customer_reviews.author: A. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I used to regularly wear Pumas but switched to Vans a couple of years ago and this shoe was my return to Puma. The size is as marked, which is good, but the shoe is nowhere near as comfortable as Vans. Its pretty disappointing because I do like the style.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Swear by Puma Suede Classics. Wanted something suede; slightly different and cheaper. These hit the mark. It is clear they are a more budget-conscious line (I.e. the swoosh is plastic rather than suede) yet was expecting that. Hopefully they will last a long time. Got them in Forest colour which I love.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are so comfy due to the memory foam. They're easily as comfortable as the Go Walk Skechers but look that bit more fashionable. Great to pair up with a summer dress too!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer,and good price,quick delivery, my husband is a size 8 always buys an 8 and 1/2 in puma trainers, all in all great 😀
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These trainers fit perfectly well but when wearing them for more than an hour or two seem to feel really uncomfortable like they are forcing my feet into a strange angle. They look great though, just the comfort issue is why I dont wear them
customer_reviews.author: Martin Dunne

customer_reviews.title: good made Puma shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted but unfortunately because my feet had swollen i could not get them on. Looking forward to when my feet get back to normal when I shall buy a pair of these shoes. In the meantime I returned them to Amazon (no problem) and purchased specially made wide fitting shoes from them
customer_reviews.author: W.A.D.28

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting in my experience
customer_reviews.text: I've had these trainers just over two months and there are already two holes in the sole. If you don't do a lot of walking then they might be okay for you but had I known I'd only get a few months out of them I probably wouldn't have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: unabatedshagie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: The colour is actually beige not steel grey .. I prefer beige! The tongue is a little long for me but no real problem.. in every other respect, I love them. They look good & they’re exceptionall comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: beg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: I'd say these shoes are pretty nice. Umm 6 fits me perfect in general but ive realised my true comfortable size is 7.. that is what i ordered ... a 7 and i wasnt dissapointment one bit. It is a quite narrow shoe.. but i have broad feet anf it aint bad at all. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisy

customer_reviews.title: I bit too soft
customer_reviews.text: At first try very comfortable. When I started walking around, I found it a bit too too soft in heel area. Almost sinking in amount of foam. Maybe it's just prefence. But don't think will buy this model again. Like suede look
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata lisztwan

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. Looks good, very comfortable and a great price! May also buy in another colour. Have already recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: They look really good but these are a narrow fit people so just ...
customer_reviews.text: They look really good but these are a narrow fit people so just be aware when purchasing these. I am wearing mine but I have had to lace them so to leave them untied when wearing them. They feel a bit more comfortable now but they are a bit tight still for a size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Geddy22

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up in the sale, fits to size. So comfortable, and seem very durable! Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: haz00mc3

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Returned these to Amazon for a refund so I could get the next size up. Sent back on 4th June. NO REFUND RECEIVED !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Roger Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking and very comfortable trainers...... these pumas also look great. Would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: jtownsend

customer_reviews.title: Nice smart trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for his birthday. They came quickly and were in perfect condition. They fit nicely and look great. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Nettlefairy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: These were a present and I was told they are comfortable and look very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Mind the Size
customer_reviews.text: I routinely take a UK 12. When delivered despite being sized as a 12 they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Dippers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of these, all different colours, and all comfortable and hard wearing.
customer_reviews.author: GPross57

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrow for the wider of feet, but superbly comfortable, smart looking for the casually dressed occasion. Quite squeaky on a wooden floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes has very uncomfortable fit. Walking not far from house ok, but after a day of wear my arch was hurting so much, that I couldn't stand it. Never had issues with any of trainers, but these.
customer_reviews.author: Yevheniia

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfey all rounder trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Good trainers, nice casual very comfey after the first ware. Got the green ones, they look ace. The material has started to bobble a bit after a week but this is probably normal with this type of trainer.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: still going strong over a year later
customer_reviews.text: great purchase good value at the time as they are the only trainers partner has not managed to destroy!
customer_reviews.author: jemma_wag

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide fit and normally wear a size 8. I ordered a size larger which fits perfectly. Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: simon bennett

customer_reviews.title: Nice trsinerd
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers. A bit tight compared to Adidas. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White tongue too short and suspect fake puma
customer_reviews.text: Liked the trainers colour and fitted well. The tongue however was white and too short. Looked at puma trainers on line and didn’t match.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice smart looking trainers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the green trainers and they seem to fit well, they look to be well made and come with nice thick laces.
customer_reviews.author: John M Ward

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: They are nice. But didn’t realise the tounge is so flimsy. Wouldn’t buy again to be honest. Look ok when in long trousers but dont like them when in shorts
customer_reviews.author: GreenGiant

customer_reviews.title: Puma trainers
customer_reviews.text: These were worn about 3 times They look old and battered all ready very poor quality not what I would expect from a reputable company like PUMA
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Ann

customer_reviews.title: Ok if in a sale
customer_reviews.text: Fit for the first few months was great then they went really out of shape. Bulky on the toe area
customer_reviews.author: crumble

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for a nice pair of trainers. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Andrew Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Larger
customer_reviews.text: They seemed a bit plastic, and larger than said size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes to walk in
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them in the gym, but walked miles on holiday in them. Comfortable if narrow
customer_reviews.author: SimonGP

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are not only very comfortable, they look good as well, with the good value price and prompt delivery I will definitely be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Coll

customer_reviews.title: Filthy trainers
customer_reviews.text: Cant believe when they came they had been used,,,dirty scuffed worn ..whe checks this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mr N Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - slightly tighter than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dads birthday - he's a strict size 10 - but i bought 10 and a half as i was told Pumas are slightly tighter fitting. Turns out they are! Perfect fit at half a size bigger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of sizing
customer_reviews.text: Really good trainers, but size 8 is a tight fit. Maybe it's wise to order a larger size that you're used to.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are not genuine Puma. They arrived in a plain cardboard box with no label or logo; the trainers were of shoddy quality with poor stitching and very flimsy suede - much thinner than usual Puma trainers. They also did not have the correct label on the tongue of the trainer. If you want the genuine article, avoid these!
customer_reviews.author: John A Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer for out and about
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father in law as a pair he had off ebay came up small, these fitted fine and werer the same price. Great looking and last for ages. Ideal trainer for out and about
customer_reviews.author: Steveooooooo

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: last pair of these i bought lasted me over a year and that's with everyday use
customer_reviews.author: mag1cc

customer_reviews.title: Have had Puma before and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side but wearable. Have had Puma before and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Quality and strength
customer_reviews.text: I am really sorry to write this review but the trainers did not last long. After 6 weeks of wearing them (purely for walking), the right one broke on the side. I think it is due to the fact that the fabric is not very strong. I am a bit disappointed about it as I was hoping they will last a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Kopaniarski

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly comfortable piece of footwear
customer_reviews.text: A surprisingly comfortable piece of footwear, despite a rather prominent arch-support in the default insole. Nice looking, great fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lemony

customer_reviews.title: I love Puma trainers and these have not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma trainers and these have not disappointed. The fit is excellent, they look good and the price is reasonable. Also, good service.
customer_reviews.author: Glynis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Took them to India to my friend and he was delighted. They love shoes from the UK over there Good buy definitely !
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a smaller pair but i asked for a replacement and i got it very fast. Now i have the send the smallest one back. The trainers are good quality and they look like in the picture and feels good wearing them. Thank you guys !
customer_reviews.author: Rusch

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? Fashionable and comfortable and all for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this product. They arrived as estimated and were well packaged
customer_reviews.author: LOR_ALL

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: The product did not fit me The shoe was very narrow and internal appeared to have a poor finish and was very rough and I am sorry to say that I would not be able to recommend it to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Keith Prowse

customer_reviews.title: Trainer shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son had these and loves them says so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and great quality. Wear them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Lynn Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers!!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these Pumas for 3 years now. Fit well and are wider than other brands for men with bigger feet. Good value too!!
customer_reviews.author: Theron

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but cheap sole
customer_reviews.text: Look great, fit well but the sole is so thin (cost saving I guess) your foot isn’t protected from what you walk on (ouch!) Adidas much better in this respect.
customer_reviews.author: Growler Mathias

customer_reviews.title: confortable
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried them the right foot didn't feel right, it seem to be small but after walking with them for half an hour it feels absolutely fine! They are really confortable and warm. But you really need to walk with them for half an hour to feel right.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very thin sole!
customer_reviews.text: These trainers look nice and fit well, but the sole is so thin, that it's almost like walking barefoot, and there's no arch support whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: hoxtonist

customer_reviews.title: Fairly narrow fit but true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for husband. He really likes them. True to size and lovely quality
customer_reviews.author: Lou-be-lei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The go to brand for hubby, fit perfectly look great
customer_reviews.author: catherine mearns

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present so not used yet but look fine
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Annies

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Good design, very lightweight, also quite narrow so not a great fit. Soles are also quite thin
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Same as always. I love Puma Icra trainers. 4th or 5th pair. Good fit. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Gordymac555

customer_reviews.title: they are comfy and look great, i had to order a 0
customer_reviews.text: a bit to thin , but i should have expected that, they are comfy and look great, i had to order a 0.5 size larger and i got exact fit
customer_reviews.author: Claudyu

customer_reviews.title: look nice but very uncomfortable as far too tight width
customer_reviews.text: look nice but very uncomfortable as far too tight width. Very uncomfortable to walk in let alone do anything sporty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers. I ordered half a size larger than I needed. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ball

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality for the price. Would definitely buy these again. Really comfortable day to day trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great and fast postage too
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes, love the color, will defo be buying more when i can
customer_reviews.author: john croft

customer_reviews.title: ... narrow side but in time they should fit perfectly like previous puma shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Slightly on the narrow side but in time they should fit perfectly like previous puma shoes I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable.. Normally suffer in
customer_reviews.text: Got these for holiday .. as they was a nice price .
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great but don't last well.
customer_reviews.text: Had a for a few months, tight to wear at start but still very comfortable and stylish. However, after 3 months of use theirs now holes in the soles and I’m now having to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like it, still wearing it after maybe 1 year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: both my son and I love these, they fit right and looking feel great
customer_reviews.author: ep

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice comfy and reasonalbe style - dare to buck the Adidas trend?!?!
customer_reviews.author: AGD

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Previous lasted me 2 years of wearing. They are comfortable to wear and the size was what I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Goncearov

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Runners are very comfy and lightweight. Good support while being soft inside. Have in 2 colours and love both
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought a half size larger than my normal size 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a half size larger than my normal size 7 and it was still a bit tight. I held on them because they are a lovely iconic trainer, very stylish and summer feel.
customer_reviews.author: Brian ONeill

customer_reviews.title: perfect a always
customer_reviews.text: normally found Puma trainers to be consistent with sizing. Great value and comfortable although this can up fractionally smaller (in length) than normal. Width is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C M Bignell Mrs R A Bignell

customer_reviews.title: I love them - I just love that classic look that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them - I just love that classic look that these have, comfortable too. I took out the green laces and replaced them with white ones and they look even better In my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with my purchase. Roomy fit so great if you have broad feet.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, so pretty, and the price of them is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S

customer_reviews.title: Great fit true too size
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd pair I have bought for my partner he loves them so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Linda a walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable trainer, very slightly on the small side so some say get half size up. Look great for a smart casual look.
customer_reviews.author: Stubaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and perfect if you're feet are slightly wider. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Banging
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, bit different in the green, lovely look and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and hard wearing
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes, lightweight too, and good pedal grip on a bike. But order a size up if your feet are wide as these are narrow compared to vans/Nike/adidas.
customer_reviews.author: jim

product_meta.title: PUMA Icra Trainer Sd Sneakers
product_meta.description: I CR a suede trainers: taking cues from one of our most iconic styles, This comfy football trainer is simple, sporty and extremely wearable.
